Uses of Class
camzup.core.Entity2

Packages that use Entity2 
Package Description
camzup.core  
camzup.pfriendly  

  • Uses of Entity2 in camzup.core

    Subclasses of Entity2 in camzup.core 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  CurveEntity2
    An entity which contains a transform that is applied to a list of curves.
    class  MeshEntity2
    An entity which contains a transform that is applied to a list of meshes.
    Methods in camzup.core that return Entity2 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Entity2 Entity2.moveBy​(Vec2 dir)
    Moves this entity by a vector.
    Entity2 Entity2.moveTo​(Vec2 locNew)
    Moves this entity to a location.
    Entity2 Entity2.moveTo​(Vec2 locNew, float step)
    Moves this entity to a location over a step in time.
    Entity2 Entity2.rotateTo​(float rotNew)
    Rotates this entity to an angle.
    Entity2 Entity2.rotateTo​(float rotNew, float step)
    Rotates this entity to an angle over a step in time.
    Entity2 Entity2.rotateZ​(float radians)
    Rotates this entity by an angle around the z axis.

  • Uses of Entity2 in camzup.pfriendly

    Subclasses of Entity2 in camzup.pfriendly 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  ImageEntity2
    A convenience to create image planes.
    class  TextEntity2
    A convenience to create billboards which present text strings as a single image texture.
